CustomField.description: Age of the service order grouped in buckets for reporting purposes.
CustomField.formula: IF (SVMXC__Age__c <= 7, "Less Than 8 days", IF (SVMXC__Age__c <= 15, "8 To 15 days", IF (SVMXC__Age__c <= 30, "16 to 30 days", "More Than 30 days")))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Age of the service order grouped in buckets for reporting purposes.
CustomField.label: Age Bucket
